text_summary: Government stresses global cooperation towards carbon neutrality
Media highlights disputes between major emitters and slow progress
Public reacts with mixed hope and doubt about real action
Government announces strict rules for safe AI development
Media focuses on tech companies warning about slowed innovation
Public expresses mixed feelings about privacy and transparency
Government celebrates unity and congratulates national team
Media covers dramatic moments and referee controversies
Public expresses excitement with some frustration over decisions
Government frames layoffs as an economic readjustment
Media highlights large-scale layoffs and emotional worker stories
Public reacts with fear and anger about job security
Government promises emergency funding and international aid
Media focuses on destruction and lack of preparation
Public expresses sadness and calls for accountability
Government claims election was fair and transparent
Media reports accusations of irregularities
Public expresses mixed reactions about fairness
Government highlights strong recovery and economic improvements
Media points out gaps in support for vulnerable populations
Public discusses relief with cautious optimism
Government celebrates technological achievement and national pride
Media highlights budget concerns and technical risks
Public expresses excitement and admiration
Government emphasizes stability and long-term control plans
Media focuses on rising costs and public struggle
Public expresses frustration and concern
Government assures public that systems are secure and investigation ongoing
Media highlights scale of breach and vulnerabilities
Public expresses anger and fear over stolen data
Government announces subsidies and crisis management plans
Media emphasizes shortages and rising electricity bills
Public expresses anxiety about heating and bills
Government expresses commitment to peace negotiations
Media focuses on casualties and destroyed infrastructure
Public expresses fear and sadness
Government highlights improvements in access and quality
Media questions practicality and budget concerns
Public shows cautious optimism with some doubt
Government asks for patience and promises negotiations
Media reports chaos
Public expresses anger at disruptions
Government announces heat warnings and support measures
Media highlights deaths and healthcare pressure
Public expresses worry and discomfort
